name: Dirty Dancing: Devils Brawl
description:
A Top Down shooter where you cannot aim for yourself. (Genre Without Mechanic: 2018)

A Game where there is only one weapon. (Only One - 2019)

A Game where the two players are joined together by a health bar, but also through there weapon, the one boomerang. The boomerang will always target the other player and can only be picked up by them. Only one of you can have it at a time. (Joined Together: 2021)

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND PLAYING WITH TWO PEOPLE

Controls:

( All refer to Xbox Controllers )

P1: Uses Gamepad 1 

  • Move: WASD, D-Pad, Left Stick
  • Throw Boomerang: Q, Space, Controller A, Controller RT

P2: Uses Gamepad 2

  • Move: IJKL, D-Pad, Left Stick
  • Throw Boomerang: U, Space, Controller A, Controller RT

Music: Maple Leaf Rag by Kevin MacLeod

Sound Effects: By Me

Art: By Me

TELL ME YOUR HIGHSCORE

1-P HS: 175

2-P HS: 425
